flawed_nl_solution:
In one hour, Addison mountain's temperature will decrease to 3/4 of the temperature it is now, meaning the temperature will decrease to 3/4*84=<<3/4*84=336/3>>336/3 degrees.
The temperature decrease will be 84-336/3=<<84-336/3=-28>>-28 degrees

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63, not 336/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
